response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the bottle of lotion without any execution errors. The next step is to grasp the bottle of lotion.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the bottle of lotion.
(2) Grasp the bottle of lotion.
(3) Move the robot to the carton.
(4) Put the bottle of lotion in the carton.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the bottle of lotion
    bottle_of_lotion_195 = registry(env,"bottle_of_lotion_195")
    EasyGrasp(robot, bottle_of_lotion_195)
    donothing(env)
